description: Detects processes leveraging the "ms-msdt" handler or the "msdt.exe" binary to execute arbitrary commands as seen in the follina (CVE-2022-30190) vulnerability
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (rule)
name: Potential Arbitrary Command Execution Using MSDT.EXE
query: (((process.executable.text:*\\msdt.exe) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"msdt.exe")) AND ((process.command_line.text:*IT_BrowseForFile\=*) OR ((process.command_line.text:*\ PCWDiagnostic* AND process.command_line.text:(*\ \/af\ * OR *\ \-af\ *)))))
